comments:
Attempt to combine a new event with a list of previous events.

The ``old_event`` will be scanned in reverse, and ``.combine(new_event)`` will be called on each. If a combination can be made, the function will return immediately. Otherwise, ``new_event`` will be appended to ``old_events``.
##### Args
* **new_event (DocumentChangedEvent) **: The new event to attempt to combine

##### Returns
